name: GovStrat
goal:
GovStrat is a technology & digital consulting firm providing customized technology strategy and consulting services.

We are specialized in helping SMEs to manage their intellectual property licensing (including SEPs valuation) and standardization strategy.
interests: Competition, Digital economy and society, Research and innovation, Single market, Transport
euInitiatives: Standardization, GDPR, e-privacy, intellectual property, cybersecurity, e-commerce, cloud, cryptocurrency, internet of things, connected cars
